# Test that we get the same markdown output for a file with no directives
# a markdown file

preguide -out _output
! stdout .+
! stderr .+
cmp _output/_posts/nodirectives.md nodirectives/en.out.golden

-- nodirectives/en.md --
---
---
# Heading 1

This is a test
-- nodirectives/en.out.golden --
---
lang: en
---
# Heading 1

This is a test
